1953934.effect: If this card is activated: You can add 1 "Earthbound" monster from your GY to your hand. You cannot Summon monsters, except "Earthbound" monsters. You can only control 1 "Idol to the Earthbound Immortal" face-up on your field.

1218423.effect:
Activate 1 of these effects, also, after that, Set this card face-down instead of sending it to the GY. You can only use 1 of followings effects of "Blackclaws Rest" once per turn.
● if a face-up "Blackclaw" monster you control is destroyed by battle, or leaves the field because of an opponent's card effect; gain LP equal to that monster's original DEF, and if you do, shuffle it into the Deck.

You can only use each effect of "Apocrypha Oniphia" once per turn.

1403912.effect:
If you control an "Apocrypha" Ritual Monster, you can Special Summon this card from your hand, and if you do, this card gains 1000 ATK as long as an "Apocrypha" Ritual Monster is face-up on the field.. You can only use each of the following effects of "Apocrypha Onizar" once per turn. You cannot Summon monsters the turn you activate either of these effects, except "Apocrypha" monsters.
● You can banish 1 Ritual Spell from your Deck; add 1 "Apocrypha" Ritual Monster from your Deck to your hand, then discard 1 "Apocrypha" card.
● You can banish 1 Ritual Monster from your Deck; Until the end of your opponent's next turn, this card's name and effects becomes that card's, and its' ATK becomes equal to that monster's.

When this card leaves the field; Destroy all cards you control. If this Ritual Summoned card is in your GY, and you control an "Apoctypha" monster (Quick Effect): Banish this card from your GY; add 1 "Apocrypha" card from your Deck to your hand, then send 1 "Apocrypha" card from your hand to your GY. You can only use each effect of "Apocryphais, The Evil Serpent Deity" once per turn.

1405234.effect: This card can be used to Ritual Summon "Apocryphais, The Evil Serpent Deity". 1404711.effect: When a Spell/Trap Card, or monster effect, is activated while you control an "Apocrypha" monster: Negate the activation, and if you do, banish that card. You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn you activate this effect, except "Apocrypha" monsters. You can only use 1 "Apocryphal Annihilation" effect per turn, and only once that turn.

1404716.effect:
If you control an "Apocrypha" Ritual Monster, you can activate this card from your hand. You can only use 1 of "Apocrypha Forbidden Alchemy" per turn, and only once that turn.
● You can target 1 "Apocrypha" monster you control; destroy it, then your opponent must give control of 1 monster they control to you. That monster's name becomes "Apocryphal Sacrifice", and it's effects are negated. 
● You can banish 1 card from your hand; draw 1 card.
● You can banish this card from your GY; Send 2 "Apocrypha" cards from your Deck to your GY.

You can only use 1 effect of "Apocryphal Descendant Archenem" per turn, and only once that turn.

1894025.effect: You can Ritual Summon this card with any "Queltz" card. You can discard this card; add 1 "Queltz" card from your Deck to your hand. You can only use 1 "Cradle Queltz" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
1894025.name: Cradle Queltz

1892644.effect: You can Ritual Summon this card with any "Queltz" card. (Quick Effect): You can target 1 of your banished cards and 1 of your opponent's banished cards; shuffle them into the Deck, then change 1 face-up monster on the field into face-down Defense Position. During the End Phase: Banish the top 5 cards of each player's Deck, face-down. You can only use 1 "Sacred Queltz" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
1892644.name: Sacred Queltz

1892708.effect: You can Ritual Summon this card with any "Queltz" card. (Quick Effect): You can target 3 of your opponent's face-down banished cards; shuffle them into the Deck, banish 1 card in this card's column, face-down, then banish this card your next Standby Phase. During the End Phase: Banish the top 5 cards of each player's Deck, face-down. You can only use 1 "Hallowed Queltz" effect per turn, and only once that turn.

1893258.effect: You can Ritual Summon this card with any "Queltz" card. (Quick Effect): Your make your opponent shuffle 2 of their banished cards into the Deck, then, have your opponent draw 1 card and banish 1 card from their hand, face-down. During the End Phase: Banish the top 5 cards of each player's Deck, face-down. You can only use 1 "Fury Queltz" effect per turn, and only once that turn.

1893760.effect: You can Ritual Summon this card with any "Queltz" card. When your opponent activates a monster effect on the field (Quick Effect): You can target 7 banished cards; shuffle all 7 into the Deck, and if you do, negate the effects of that opponent's monster, also, during the End Phase, if it is in the same column, banish it, face-down. During the End Phase: Banish the top 5 cards of each player's Deck, face-down. You can only use 1 "Nova Queltz" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
1893760.name: Nova Queltz

1892679.effect: You can Ritual Summon this card with any "Queltz" card. (Quick Effect): You can target 1 of your banished cards and 2 of your opponent's banished cards; shuffle them into the Deck, then your opponent banishes 3 cards from their GY, face-down. During the End Phase: Banish the top 5 cards of each player's Deck, face-down. You can only use 1 "Divine Queltz" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
1892679.name: Divine Queltz

1893271.effect: Your opponent banishes 1 random card from your hand, face-down, then, you add 2 "Queltz" Ritual Monsters from your Deck to your hand with different Levels. If this card is in the GY: You can target 1 "Queltz" monster you control; banish this card from your GY, face-down, then that target gains 200 ATK for each face-down banished card. You can only use 1 "Queltz Crowning" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
1893271.name: Queltz Crowning

1892646.effect:
This card can be used to Ritual Summon any FIRE Thunder Ritual Monster. You must also banish cards from the top of your Deck, face-down, equal to the Level of the Ritual Monster you Ritual Summon. If this card is in your GY: You can activate 1 of these effects.
● Target 1 FIRE Thunder Ritual Monster in your GY; banish this card from your GY, face-down, and if you do, add that target to your hand.
● Banish 1 other card from your GY, face-down; add this card from your GY to your hand.
You can only use this effect of "Queltz Dagger" once per turn. You cannot Special Summon monsters from the Deck the turn you activate this card.
1892646.name: Queltz Dagger

1892736.effect:
Reveal 1 "Queltz" Ritual Monster in your hand, then activate 1 of these effects.
● Target 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls; place it on the top of the Deck.
● Ritual Summon the revealed monster from your hand, by paying LP equal to its DEF.
You can only activate 1 "Queltz Storm" per turn.
1892736.name: Queltz Storm

1892731.effect: If you control a "Queltz" Ritual Monster: Target 2 cards your opponent controls in different columns; destroy all your opponent's cards in the Main Monster Zones and Spell & Trap Zones in those columns, also those zones cannot be used until the end of their next turn. You can only activate 1 "Queltz Fright" per turn.
1892731.name: Queltz Fright

1893606.effect: Declare different card names, up to the number of "Queltz" Ritual Monsters you control; for each of those declared card names, your opponent must reveal and banish 1 copy of that card from their Deck, face-down, if possible. Then, for each declared card they did not banish from their Deck, you must banish the top 3 cards of your Deck, face-down. You can only activate 1 "Queltz Paranoia" per turn.
1893606.name: Queltz Paranoia

1893375.effect: Once per turn, during the End Phase: You can make each player banish 1 card they control, face-down, if possible, except "Queltz Dominance". Once per turn, during the Standby Phase, you must banish the top 5 cards of your Deck, face-down (this is not optional), or this card is destroyed. You can only control 1 "Queltz Dominance".
1893375.name: Queltz Dominance

1894071.effect:
3 Level 3 monsters
Once per turn, you can also Xyz Summon "Legion Queltz" by revealing 1 "Queltz" card in your hand, then using 1 Normal Summoned monster, or 1 Ritual Monster, you control as material. You cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck the turn you Special Summon this card, except FIRE Thunder monsters. If you control no other monsters: You can target 1 banished card; attach it to this card as material. You can detach 1 material from this card; add 1 "Queltz" Ritual Monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Legion Queltz" once per turn.
1894071.name: Legion Queltz

1874768.effect: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned, you can discard 1 card; Special Summon one "The Silent" monster from your hand or Deck. You can only use this effect of "The Silent Child" once per turn.
1874768.name: The Silent Child

1877020.effect: Target one "The Silent" monster in your GY; Special Summon that target. During either player's turn, you can banish this card from your GY, except the turn this card was sent to the GY; destroy cards your opponent controls up to the number of "The Silent" monsters you control.
1877020.name: The Silent Relic - Silent Seal

1877080.effect: All "The Silent" monsters you control gain 300 ATK/DEF. If a "The Silent" monster you control is destroyed by battle or by card effect: you can draw 1 card, then place one card from your hand on the bottom of the Deck. You can only control one "The Silent Otherworld."
1877080.name: The Silent Otherworld

1874742.effect: If you control a face-up "The Silent" monster, you can Special Summon this card from your hand or GY. You can only Special Summon "The Silent Nurse" this way up to twice per turn. Once per turn, you can target one Level 4 or lower "The Silent" monster you control; change its Level between 1 and 4.
1874742.name: The Silent Nurse

1877069.effect: When this card is activated: Look at the top 3 cards of your Deck, then you can reveal 1 "The Silent" card among them, and add it to your hand, also place the remaining cards on top of your Deck in any order. All "The Silent" monsters you control gain 500 ATK/DEF.
1877069.name: The Silent Hill

1874715.effect: If this card is sent to the GY as material for the Synchro or Link Summon of a "The Silent" monster: you can Special Summon up to two "The Silent Screechers" from your hand or Deck. You can only use this effect of "The Silent Screecher" once per turn.
1874715.name: The Silent Screecher

1874825.effect:
2 "The Silent" monsters
If this card is Link Summoned: you can add a "The Silent" Spell or Trap from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Abstract, the Silent Father" once per turn. All "The Silent" monsters this card points to gain 200 ATK & DEF.
1874825.name: Abstract, The Silent Father

1874758.effect:
1 Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner "The Silent" monsters
If this card is Synchro Summoned: you can Special Summon one "The Silent" monster from your GY, except "Jess and Wyatt, The Silent Twins." Before damage calculation, if this card battles an opponent's DARK monster, except a "The Silent" monster, destroy that opponent's monster.
1874758.name: Jess and Wyatt, The Silent Twins
1874758.treated_as: Jess and Wyatt, The Silent Twins

1874699.effect:
3+ "The Silent" monsters
Must first be Fusion Summoned. If this card is Fusion Summoned: You can make all "The Silent" monsters you control gain 100 ATK for each material used for this card's Fusion Summon. During your Main Phase (Quick Effect), you can send this card to the GY; this turn, when a "The Silent" monster attacks a Defense Position monster, deal piercing battle damage to your opponent.
1874699.name: Pyramid Head, The Silent Tormentor

1874796.effect:
3+ "The Silent" monsters
Cannot be Tributed or used as Fusion or Link Material. If this card is Link Summoned: Give control of this card to your opponent. If this card attacks a "The Silent" monster, before damage calculation, destroy that opponent's monster. During the End Phase of the next turn after this card was Link Summoned: banish all monsters you control, except this card, and if you do, give control of this card to your opponent. You can only use this effect of "Wyatt, The Silent Survivor" once per turn.
1874796.name: Wyatt, The Silent Survivor

1506615.effect: If this card is Normal Summoned: You can add 1 "Plushmage" Spell/Trap card from your Deck to your hand. If this card is detached from a "Plushmage" Xyz Monster: You can target up to 3 "Plushmage" monsters in your GY with different names (min. 2); shuffle them into the Deck, then draw 1 card. You can only use each effect of "Plushmage Branchugger" once per turn.
1506615.name: Plushmage Branchugger

1506404.effect: You can target 1 "Plushmage" monster you control; Special Summon this card from your hand, and if you do, take damage equal to that monster's original ATK. If this card is detached from a "Plushmage" Xyz Monster and sent to the GY: You can banish 1 "Plushmage monster from your GY; gain LP equal to its ATK, and if you do, add this card to your hand and reveal it. You can only use each effect of "Plushmage Matchstrike" once per turn.
1506404.name: Plushmage Matchstrike

1505912.effect: If this card is in the GY: You can target 1 Spellcaster Xyz Monster you control; detach 1 material from that monster, and if you do, Special Summon this card, also take 400 damage. You can only use this effect of "Plushmage Powerball" once per turn. If you Xyz Summon using this card, you can also use 1 "Plushmage" monster in your hand as material.
1505912.name: Plushmage Powerball

1506002.effect: (Quick Effect): You can discard this card; for the rest of this turn, the first time each "Plushmage" monster you control would be destroyed by battle, it is not. If you take effect damage while this card is in the GY: You can Special Summon this card, and if you do, this card gains ATK equal to the damage you took, then you gain LP equal to half of this card's ATK. You can only use this effect of "Plushmage Rainyday" once per turn.
1506002.name: Plushmage Rainyday

1506726.effect: When a Spellcaster Xyz Monster or "Plushmage" monster you control battles: You can discard this card, and if you do, that battling monster gains 2000 ATK, until the end of the turn. You can banish this card from your GY; Special Summon 1 "Plushmage" monster from your hand or GY, and if you do, it gains 800 ATK/DEF, also you take 400 damage. You can only use this effect of "Plushmage Trickfiend" once per turn.
1506726.name: Plushmage Trickfiend

1506921.effect: If you control a Spellcaster monster, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). You can Special Summon "Plushmage Windygal" once per turn this way. You can target 1 other "Plushmage" monster you control; send it to the GY, and if you do, draw 2 card and reveal them, then discard 1 card. If you reveal a "Plushmage" monster in your hand by a card effect: You can take 400 damage, and if you do, for the rest of this turn, "Plushmage" monsters you control gain 800 ATK/DEF while this card is face-up on the field. You can only use each effectof "Plushmage Windygal" once per turn.
1506921.name: Plushmage Windygal

1509019.effect: You can discard 1 card; add 2 "Plushmage" monsters with different atttributes from your Deck to your hand. You can only activate 1 "Basket of Plushmages" per turn.
1509019.name: Basket of Plushmages

1509005.effect: Target 1 "Plushmage" monter in your GY; Special Summon it in Defense Position. You can only activate 1 "Plushmage Patch-up" per turn.
1509005.name: Plushmage Patch-up

1506925.effect:
2+ Level 4 Spellcaster monsters
(Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card; banish 1 "Plushmage" monster from your GY, and if you do, for the rest of this turn, this card gains ATK/DEF equal to that monster's ATK/DEF. (Quick Effect): You can detach up to 2 materials from this card and target 1 monster on the field; send 1 "Plushmage" monster from your hand or Deck to the GY, and if you do, that targeted monster becomes the same Type and Attribute as the sent monster, then, if you detached 2 "Plushmage" monsters to activate this effect, you can draw 1 card and reveal it. You can only use each effect of "Plushmage Bunpal" once per turn.
1506925.name: Plushmage Bunpal

1882114.effect: You cannot Summon monsters, except "Suzerain" monsters. If this card is Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 "Suzerain" monster from your GY, but banish that monster when it leaves the field. During your opponent's Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can Tribute this card then target 1 monster your opponent controls; this turn, that monster cannot activate its effects, then add 1 "Tales of Suzerain" card from your GY to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Suzerain Baroness" once per turn.
1882114.name: Suzerain Baroness

1882121.effect: You cannot Summon monsters, except "Suzerain" monsters. If this card is Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Suzerain" monster from your hand. During your opponent's Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can Tribute this card then target 1 monster your opponent controls; this turn, that monster cannot be Tributed, or used as material for a Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, or Link Summon, then add 1 "Tales of Suzerain" card from your GY to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Suzerain Countess" once per turn.
1882121.name: Suzerain Countess

1882103.effect: You cannot Summon monsters, except "Suzerain" monsters. If this card is Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Suzerain" monster from your Deck, but that monster cannot activate its effects when it is Summoned. During your opponent's Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can Tribute this card then target 1 monster your opponent controls; this turn, that monster cannot declare an attack, then add 1 "Tales of Suzerain" card from your GY to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Suzerain Duchess" once per turn.
1882103.name: Suzerain Duchess

1882112.effect: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) while you have activated at least 2 "Tales of Suzerain" cards this turn. If your opponent controls 2 or more cards (Quick Effect): You can target up to 2 "Tales of Suzerain" cards in your GY; return them to your hand, then make your opponent send 1 card they control to the GY. You can only use each effect of "Suzerain Empress" once per turn.
1882112.name: Suzerain Empress

1882154.effect: You can only activate this card during your Standby Phase. Add 1 "Suzerain" monster from your Deck to your hand, then discard 1 card. If the last Spell you activated this turn was "Tales of Suzerain - The Apparitions", and you control a "Suzerain" monster, you can add 2 "Suzerain" monsters instead. You can only activate 1 "Tales of Suzerain - The Progenitor" per turn.
1882154.name: Tales of Suzerain - The Progenitor

1882155.effect: You can only activate this card during your Standby Phase. Target 1 "Suzerain" monster in your GY; Banish it, then Special Summon another Level 4 "Suzerain" monster from your GY. If the last Spell you activated this turn was "Tales of Suzerain - The Progenitor", and you control a "Suzerain" monster, you can also Special Summon 1 "Suzerain" Synchro or Xyz monster from your GY. You can only activate 1 "Tales of Suzerain - The Historian" per turn.
1882155.name: Tales of Suzerain - The Historian

1882174.effect: You can only activate this card during your Standby Phase. Add 1 "Suzerain" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand, except a "Tales of Suzerain" card, then discard 1 card. If the last Spell you activated this turn was "Tales of Suzerain - The Historian", and you control a "Suzerain" monster, you can also add 1 "Tales of Suzerain" card from your Deck to your hand. You can only activate 1 "Tales of Suzerain - The Overseer" per turn.
1882174.name: Tales of Suzerain - The Overseer

1882158.effect: You can only activate this card during your Standby Phase. Send 1 "Suzerain" card from your hand or field to the GY, then draw 1 card. If the last Spell you activated this turn was "Tales of Suzerain - The Overseer", and you control a "Suzerain" monster, you can draw 1 more card. You can only activate 1 "Tales of Suzerain - The Architect" per turn.
1882158.name: Tales of Suzerain - The Architect

1882182.effect: You can only activate this card during your Standby Phase. Target 1 monster your opponent controls; destroy it, then send 1 other card you control to the GY. If the last Spell you activated this turn was "Tales of Suzerain - The Architect", and you control a "Suzerain" monster, you can target 2 monsters instead. You can only activate 1 "Tales of Suzerain - The Punishers" per turn.
1882182.name: Tales of Suzerain - The Punishers

1882188.effect: You can only activate this card during your Standby Phase. Target 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls; destroy it, then send 1 other card you control to the GY. If the last Spell you activated this turn was "Tales of Suzerain - The Punishers", and you control a "Suzerain" monster, you can target 2 Spells/Traps instead. You can only activate 1 "Tales of Suzerain - The Apparitions" per turn.
1882188.name: Tales of Suzerain - The Apparitions

1882191.effect: If this card would be destroyed by a card effect: You can send 1 other card you control to the GY instead. When this card is activated, and during your Standby Phase: You can add 1 "Tales of Suzerain" card from your Deck to your hand. During your opponent's End Phase: You can Special Summon 1 "Suzerain" monster from your GY. If you control no monsters, you can only Special Summon a Level 4 monster with this effect. You can only use each effect of "Suzerain Sovereignty" once per turn.
1882191.name: Suzerain Sovereignty

1906503.effect: Special Summon 1 "Suzerain" monster from your Deck or that is banished. During your Standby Phase: If you activated 3 or more "Tales of Suzerain" cards this turn, you can Set this card from your GY, also banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use each effect of "The Beginning of the Suzerains" once per turn.
1906503.name: The Beginning of the Suzerains

1882198.effect: When your opponent activates a Spell/Trap Card or a monster effect while you control a "Suzerain" monster; negate that activation and destroy that card. During your Standby Phase: If you activated 3 or more "Tales of Suzerain" cards this turn, you can Set this card from your GY, also banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use each effect of "The End of the Suzerains" once per turn.
1882198.name: The End of the Suzerains

1906518.effect: Those who control the money control the world.
1906518.name: Suzerain Marquess

1882143.effect:
1 "Suzerain" Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner Spellcaster monster(s)
The first time each turn this card would be destroyed by a card effect, it is not. If this card is Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Tales of Suzerain" card from your Deck to your hand. If your opponent activates a card or effect (Quick Effect): You can negate that effect, then you can Tribute this card to Special Summon 1 "Suzerain" monster from your GY, except "Suzerain Goddess of the Dawn". You can only use each effect of "Suzerain Goddess of the Dawn" once per turn.
1882143.name: Suzerain Goddess of the Dawn

1882146.effect:
2 Level 4 Spellcaster monsters, including a "Suzerain" monster
If this card is Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Tales of Suzerain" card from your Deck to your hand. When your opponent activates a card or effect that targets this card (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card; negate that effect. If your opponent activates a card or effect on the field (Quick Effect): You can destroy that card, then you can Tribute this card to Special Summon 1 "Suzerain" monster from your GY, except "Suzerain Goddess of the Dusk". You can only use each effect of "Suzerain Goddess of the Dusk" once per turn.
1882146.name: Suzerain Goddess of the Dusk

590011.effect:
You can only use 1 effect of "Princess Connect! Anne" per turn, and only once that turn.
● If this card is Normal Summoned: You can excavate the top 3 cards of your Deck, and if you do, you can add 1 excavated "Princess Connect!" card to your hand, also shuffle the rest into the Deck.
● When your opponent activates a card or effect that would negate the activation or effect of your "Princess Connect!" card (Quick Effect): You can Tribute this card from your hand or face-up field; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy that card.
590011.name: Princess Connect! Anne

567937.effect:
You can only use 1 effect of "Princess Connect! Arisa" per turn, and only once that turn.
● If this card is Normal Summoned: You can excavate the top 3 cards of your Deck, and if you do, you can add 1 excavated "Princess Connect!" card to your hand, also shuffle the rest into the Deck.
● At the start of the Damage Step, if another "Princess Connect!" monster you control battles an opponent's monster (Quick Effect): You can Tribute this card from your hand or face-up field; return the opponent's monster to the hand.
567937.name: Princess Connect! Arisa

629984.effect:
You can only use 1 effect of "Princess Connect! Grea" per turn, and only once that turn.
● If this card is Normal Summoned: You can excavate the top 3 cards of your Deck, and if you do, you can add 1 excavated "Princess Connect!" card to your hand, also shuffle the rest into the Deck.
● You can Tribute this card from your hand or face-up field; Tribute 1 "Princess Connect" monster you control, except "Princess Connect! Grea", and if you do, draw 2 cards.
629984.name: Princess Connect! Grea

554100.effect:
You can only use 1 effect of "Princess Connect! Kokkoro" per turn, and only once that turn.
● If this card is Normal Summoned: You can excavate the top 3 cards of your Deck, and if you do, you can add 1 excavated "Princess Connect!" card to your hand, also shuffle the rest into the Deck.
● When your opponent activates a card or effect that targets a "Princess Connect!' monster(s) you control (Quick Effect): You can Tribute this card from your hand or face-up field; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it.
554100.name: Princess Connect! Kokkoro

554115.effect:
You can only use 1 effect of "Princess Connect! Kyaru" per turn, and only once that turn.
● If this card is Normal Summoned: You can excavate the top 3 cards of your Deck, and if you do, you can add 1 excavated "Princess Connect!" card to your hand, also shuffle the rest into the Deck.
● If you control a "Princess Connect!" monster other than "Princess Connect! Kyaru": You can Tribute this card from your hand or face-up field, then target 1 card your opponent controls; destroy it.
554115.name: Princess Connect! Kyaru

708668.effect:
You can only use 1 effect of "Princess Connect! Lou" per turn, and only once that turn.
● If this card is Normal Summoned: You can excavate the top 3 cards of your Deck, and if you do, you can add 1 excavated "Princess Connect!" card to your hand, also shuffle the rest into the Deck.
● If you control no monsters, or all monsters you control are "Princess Connect!" monsters (other than "Princess Connect! Lou"): You can Tribute this card from your hand or face-up field; Special Summon 1 "Princess Connect!" monster from your Deck, except "Princess Connect! Lou", also you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except "Princess Connect!" monsters.
708668.name: Princess Connect! Lou

554088.effect:
You can only use 1 effect of "Princess Connect! Pecorine" per turn, and only once that turn.
● If this card is Normal Summoned: You can excavate the top 3 cards of your Deck, and if you do, you can add 1 excavated "Princess Connect!" card to your hand, also shuffle the rest into the Deck.
● (Quick Effect): You can Tribute this card from your hand or face-up field, then target 1 "Princess Connect!" monster you control; it gains 1000 ATK/DEF until the end of your opponent's turn.
554088.name: Princess Connect! Pecorine

1965436.effect: If your "Princess Connect" monster destroys an opponent's monster by battle: Send all monsters your opponent controls to the GY, with ATK lower than the destroyed monster's ATK, then, if you control a "Princess Connect!" Fusion Monster, draw 1 card. You can only activate 1 "Princess Connect! Princess Strike" per turn.
1965436.name: Princess Connect! Princess Strike

554142.effect: Target 1 "Princess Connect!" monster you control; Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck that specifically lists that monster on the field as Fusion Material, using it as the Fusion Material.
554142.name: Princess Connect! Re:Dive

554359.effect:
You can only use 1 effect of "Princess Connect! United" per turn, and only once that turn.
● During your Main Phase, you can: Immediately after this effect resolves, Normal Summon 1 "Princess Connect!" monster.
● You can target 1 Level 4 or lower "Princess Connect!" monster in your GY; Special Summon it in Defense Position, but it cannot activate its effects this turn.
554359.name: Princess Connect! United

554075.effect: When this card is activated: You can add 1 "Princess Connect!" monster from your Deck to your hand. Once per turn: You can send 1 card from your hand to the GY, and if you do, add 1 "Princess Connect! Re:Dive" from your Deck or GY to your hand. You can only activate 1 "Princess Connect! World" per turn.
554075.name: Princess Connect! World

557074.effect: When this card is activated: Place up to 3 Aurora Counters on this card. Apply this effect, depending on the number of Aurora Counters on this card.● Exactly 1: Face-up "Princess Connect!" monsters you control are unaffected by your opponent's monster effects.● Exactly 2: Face-up "Princess Connect!" monsters you control are unaffected by your opponent's Spell effects● Exactly 3: Face-up "Princess Connect!" monsters you control are unaffected by your opponent's Trap effects.You can only control 1 "Princess Connect! Aurora Barrier".
557074.name: Princess Connect! Aurora Barrier

567680.effect: Target cards your opponent controls, up to the number "Princess Connect!" monsters you control; destroy them. You can only activate 1 "Princess Connect! Grim Burst" per turn.
567680.name: Princess Connect! Grim Burst

590022.effect: "Princess Connect! Anne" + 1 "Princess Connect!" monsterYou can target 3 "Princess Connect" cards in your GY; place them on the top of your Deck in any order, then inflict 1500 damage to your opponent. If this card is sent from the field to the GY: You can add 1 "Princess Connect!" card from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Princess Connect! Anne - Re:Dive" once per turn.
590022.name: Princess Connect! Anne - Re:Dive

567950.effect: "Princess Connect! Arisa" + 1 "Princess Connect!" monsterOnce per opponent's turn (Quick Effect): You can discard 1 card, then target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; negate its effects, and if you do, return it to the hand. If this card is sent from the field to the GY: You can add 1 "Princess Connect!" card from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Princess Connect! Arisa - Re:Dive" once per turn.
567950.name: Princess Connect! Arisa - Re:Dive

630008.effect:
"Princess Connect! Grea" + 1 "Princess Connect!" monster
If this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle: You can target 1 "Princess Connect" monster in your GY; Special Summon it. If this card is sent from the field to the GY: You can add 1 "Princess Connect!" card from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Princess Connect! Grea - Re:Dive" once per turn.
630008.name: Princess Connect! Grea - Re:Dive

554163.effect: "Princess Connect! Kokkoro" + 1 "Princess Connect!" monsterOnce per turn, when a Spell/Trap Card or effect is activated (Quick Effect): You can discard 1 card; negate the activation, and if you do, banish that card. If this card is sent from the field to the GY: You can add 1 "Princess Connect!" card from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Princess Connect! Kokkoro - Re:Dive" once per turn.
554163.name: Princess Connect! Kokkoro - Re:Dive

554157.effect: "Princess Connect! Kyaru" + 1 "Princess Connect!" monsterOnce per turn: You can target 1 other card you control and 2 cards your opponent controls; banish them. This card cannot attack the turn this effect is activated. If this card is sent from the field to the GY: You can add 1 "Princess Connect!" card from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Princess Connect! Kyaru - Re:Dive" once per turn.
554157.name: Princess Connect! Kyaru - Re:Dive

671574.effect:
"Princess Connect! Lou" + 1 "Princess Connect!" monster
Your opponent cannot target "Princess Connect!" Spells/Traps you control with card effects, also they cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects. If this card is sent from the field to the GY: You can add 1 "Princess Connect!" card from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Princess Connect! Lou - Re:Dive" once per turn.
671574.name: Princess Connect! Lou - Re:Dive

554148.effect: "Princess Connect! Pecorine" + 1 "Princess Connect!" monsterOnce per turn, during damage calculation, if this card battles an opponent's monster (Quick Effect): You can have this card gain ATK equal to half the ATK of the opponent's monster it is battling during that damage calculation only, also that monster has its effects negated during this Battle Phase. If this card is sent from the field to the GY: You can add 1 "Princess Connect!" card from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Princess Connect! Pecorine - Re:Dive" once per turn.
